body:
hey guys, so I finally managed to get iMovie working with OS X yosemite, so here's a new tutorial/gameplay video covering tips on the new avicore maps. http://youtu.be/oBqQzQAT4Fc

Enjoy!

title: Tutorial video on new avicore maps

replies.body:
Wait, OS X yosemite is out?
:O
Great video :)
EDIT: I'm pretty sure you meant OS X Mavericks. Yosemite is coming this fall...

replies.body: Pretty sure a dev account is required. I wouldn't recommend installing it even if you can. There are tons of bugs, and I regret updating.
